summary: Lin xiao, Gu li,Nan xiang and Tang Wan ru grew up together graduated from university into the workplace. They start a new journey.
cast: Mi Yang|Kai Ko|Amber Kuo|Cheney Chen|Bea Hayden Kuo|Yi-Lin Sie|Hyun Jae Lee|Vivian Dawson|Yan-Kai Ren|Chao Jiang|Miroslav Karel|Kiwi Shang|Lin Wang|Zhu Zhen
title: Xiao shi dai 3: Ci jin shi dai
